action.action-desc: Ms. Malliotakis introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the exclusion from gross income of social security benefits.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Tax Relief Unleashed for Seniors by Trump Act.

section.header: Increase in exclusion from gross income of social security benefits

subsection.text: Section 86(c) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking $25,000 in paragraph (1)(A) and inserting $50,000,
by striking $32,000 in paragraph (1)(B) and inserting $64,000,
by striking $34,000 in paragraph (2)(A) and inserting $59,000, and
by striking $44,000 in paragraph (2)(B) and inserting $76,000.

subsection.text: Section 86(c) of such Code is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

subparagraph.text: In the case of any taxable year beginning after December 31, 2026, the dollar amounts in paragraphs (1)(A), (1)(B), (2)(A), and (2)(B) shall each be increased by an amount equal to—

clause.text: the cost-of-living adjustment determined under section 1(f)(3) for the calendar year in which the taxable year begins by substituting calendar year 2025 for calendar year 2016 in subparagraph (A)(ii) thereof.

subparagraph.text: If any increase determined under subparagraph (A) is not a multiple of $100, such increase shall be rounded to nearest multiple of $100.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2025.
